details:
A vulnerability has been fixed in the libksba X.509 and CMS support library:


* [CVE-2014-9087](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2014-9087)
Fix buffer overflow in ksba\_oid\_to\_str reported by Hanno BĂśck.


For Debian 6 Squeeze, this issue has been fixed in libksba version 1.0.7-2+deb6u1


We recommend that you upgrade your libksba packages.
